title: F1 Fantasy: top picks & predictions for the 2025 Monaco GP
summary: Is it the right moment to bring in a big-hitter to your F1 Fantasy line-up for the 2025 Monaco GP? Here are our predictions; tips on drivers to avoid; which chips to play and further analysis

qa_pairs.question: What is the significance of the Monaco Grand Prix in the Formula 1 calendar?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It is one of the most prestigious and challenging races, known for its tight streets and rich history.
wrong_options: It is the longest race on the calendar.
It takes place on a high-speed oval circuit.
It is held in the winter season.

qa_pairs.question: In F1 Fantasy, what is a 'big-hitter'?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A high-performing driver who consistently scores a lot of points.
wrong_options: A rookie driver with little experience.
A team with the lowest budget.

qa_pairs.question: What is a common strategy for F1 Fantasy players during high-stakes races like Monaco?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To use chips effectively to maximize points based on driver performance and race conditions.
wrong_options: To select only rookie drivers to save budget.
To avoid selecting top teams to minimize risk.
To focus solely on constructors rather than drivers.
